entries.meaning: (rare, humorous) One who eats human flesh.
examples: The awful distich put into the mouth of the Jette or Ettin, the principal agent in this romance, 'Snouk but, snouk ben, I find the smell of earthly men,‚Äù is scarcely inferior to the 'fee faw fum' of the keen-scented anthropophaginian of the other.
